about_the_game:
As passionate fans of Nijigen and action-packed competitive games, the four of us set out to create an intense, fast-paced brawl game. After months of learning and experimenting with the game development tool "CliCli," we are excited to present our passion project. We hope you'll support us and share your thoughts!

Exciting and Tense Gameplay Mechanics

In a chaotic arena filled with unpredictability, defeat your opponents and seize their bounty points. Once defeated, you'll lose your bounty points—there’s no such thing as a permanent lead; a comeback can happen in an instant!

Unique Equipment System

In between the thrilling battles, you can purchase various abilities through a unique equipment system, allowing you to create your own fighting style. Crush your opponents in the next round and enjoy the strategy and economic management of the game!

Joyful Stealth and Positioning

Utilize map obstacles for strategic positioning and master the art of dodging and weaving. Grow and develop in the corners while observing the chaos unfold. Conserve your strength before launching a joyful ambush to snatch the bounty!

name: Shojo Warriors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 | AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 兼容
  • VR Support: 不支持
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti，AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 兼容
  • VR Support: 不支持

short_description: Shojo Warriors is a fast-paced multiplayer brawl game set in a vibrant, anime-inspired fantasy world, made with『CliCli』. In this game, you'll purchase and combine equipment during battles to help the girls achieve victory through growth and strategic gameplay.
